metadata.description: 16 production-tested skills for system administration and infrastructure management

plugins.name: vibe-skills
plugins.description: Complete collection: System administration (Unix, Windows, WSL, DevOps, MCP), cloud infrastructure (DigitalOcean, Vultr, Linode, Hetzner, Contabo, OCI), application deployment (Coolify, Kasm), and specialized tools (Stream Deck, ImageMagick). 16 production-tested skills.
